title: Amy Allwine // 83
description:
In 2016, a Minnesota woman began receiving mysterious emails, and the FBI informed her that she was the target of a hit that someone ordered on the dark web. But as the months rolled on and she amped up her home security, she still ended up dead. So, who wanted this kindhearted, god-fearing woman killed, and what exactly happened to her? This is the murder of Amy Allwine.

PATREON BONUS EPISODES: https://www.patreon.com/goingwestpodcast

CASE SOURCES:

https://www.crescenttide.com/2019/10/09/allwine-amy-louise-nee-zutz/

https://www.startribune.com/allwine-sentenced-to-life-insists-he-didn-t-kill-his-wife/472365763/?refresh=true

https://patch.com/minnesota/woodbury/minnesota-man-used-dark-web-hire-hit-man-killing-his-wife-charges

https://www.vice.com/en_us/article/3d434v/a-fake-dark-web-hitman-site-is-linked-to-a-real-murder

https://medium.com/the-partnered-pen/murderous-intentions-9f72c2f8fc55

https://nypost.com/2018/02/01/preacher-found-guilty-of-staging-wifes-murder-as-suicide/

https://www.myheritage.com/names/amy_zutz

https://www.whitepages.com/name/Amy-Zutz/MN

https://www.bailbondshq.com/minnesota/mndoc-inmate-Allwine/256147

http://dlib.scu.ac.ir/bitstream/Hannan/743362/1/9781760297855.pdf

https://www.lifedaily.com/story/salacious-murder-exposed-when-fbi-agents-reveal-church-going-family-mans-double-life/

https://malkecrimenotes.wordpress.com/tag/amy-allwine/

https://www.twincities.com/2018/01/23/cottage-grove-man-accused-murder-his-wife-trial-begins/

https://www.wired.com/story/dark-web-bitcoin-murder-cottage-grove/

https://www.ucg.org/members/news/verdict-reached-in-trial-of-stephen-allwine

content:encoded:
In 2016, a Minnesota woman began receiving mysterious emails, and the FBI informed her that she was the target of a hit that someone ordered on the dark web. But as the months rolled on and she amped up her home security, she still ended up dead. So, who wanted this kindhearted, god-fearing woman killed, and what exactly happened to her? This is the murder of Amy Allwine.
